title: Easter Hope and New Life Test
content:
This Easter season, we'll prepare around 42,000 meals for hungry men, women and children in need.

Would you help with a generous gift today?

The Easter meals you provide mean so much to people who are hungry and in crisis. For many, a hot, nutritious meal at Portland Rescue Mission will be the start of a new life in our recovery programsâ€”all for just $2.09 per meal!
